subject: Potential Breakthrough using a Recorder only for EVP
author: f1cracker75
full_text: To those of you that have and still record for EVP just using a digital recorder only, I have developed a new process which I believe may be a break through in hearing more and clearer EVP just using a recorder only, and I am talking about messages that are in complete sentences. I created a new group, and have my discovery laid out under Files > and the Folder EVP Discovery. Join this site to hear the EVP and read over my evolving process which presently is laid out in a JPG . http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/SDWR-SpeakingToTheDeadWithRecorders-/
